name: Armor Clash 1 Remake
description:
Armor Clash 1 is an RTS game made by myself in 2015. In 2021, it is remaked. I rewrite all the code and recreated the model and texture for all units and buildings.
Besides improvements in graphic and gameplay, Armor Clash 1 Remake has new geme features like jet fighters, new faction customize system implemented. In the future, after the early access, it will be new features like Challenge Mode and Navy.


1. 100% code rewrite, so why it is called remake.
2. Most of the models remake, 100% retextured.
3. Graphics are in huge upgrade, much better than AC3.
4. New physics system for vehicles.
5. New infantry details.
6. Custom Faction just as in AC1, but with new units and faction features.
7. 3V3 players map.
8. Airfield and Jet fighters.
9. Mission Maps (After Early Access)
10. Navy Maps (After Early Access)
